comments:
M5, WindowsXP Japanese, IBM java1.3.1 with no jit

SETPS
1) create DBCS project name (\u6f22\u5b57)
2) edit some files under the project
3) right click at the project and select "Add from local history..."
4) internal error dialog was shown with below message
 
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path must include project and resource 
name.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.utils.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:50)

(Workspace.java:1181)

Core is calling itself here.

There are some known problems with JDK 1.3.1's handling of DBCS file names.
Fuse-San, could you please try with JDK 1.4?
I've confirmed that it also occurred with Sun java 1.4.

could not reproduce with 20020426 including fix for 14255
